metadata.Title: CVE-2023-21122 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: In various functions of various files, there is a possible way to bypass the DISALLOW_DEBUGGING_FEATURES restriction for tracing due to a missing permission check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-11 Android-12 Android-12L Android-13Android ID: A-270050191

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
android-platform-frameworks-base package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
